21.text:
fillTrigangle(
    ctx,
    left,
    bottom,
    midX,
    top,
    right,
    bottom,
    "black"
)

23.text:
bottom = y + size - padding
top = bottom - asize

18.text:
fillTrigangle(
    ctx,
    left,
    top,
    right,
    midY,
    left,
    bottom,
    "black"
)

14.text:
fillTrigangle(
    ctx,
    left,
    midY,
    right,
    top,
    right,
    bottom,
    "black"
)

24.text:
fillTrigangle(
    ctx,
    left,
    top,
    right,
    top,
    midX,
    bottom,
    "black"
)

15.text:
left = x + padding
midY = y + size / 2
right = left + asize
top = midY - asize
bottom = midY + asize

17.text:
right = x + size - padding
left = right - asize

20.text:
midX = x + size / 2
left = midX - asize
right = midX + asize
top = y + padding
bottom = top + asize
